main event: A UFO was spotted falling behind trees in Shelby, North Carolina on July 6, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as moving like a missile with a tail of fire.
The sighting lasted for only 3 seconds as the object went from south to north, going behind trees.
There was no return on radar for the object.
The weather at the time of the sighting was partly cloudy.
This sighting was likely part of the U.S. Air Force's official Project Blue Book investigation of UFO reports.
sighted object: an object moving like a missile with a tail of fire
